Summary: Large, round. Looked like a large round building. Three levels of lights all around it.
divs: Sighting Details I was traveling in N. Georgia, on my way to Blue Ridge. It was late and dark. I was going around a mountain clockwise. I was near the top. To my right, thru the passenger window I noticed something that appeared to be descending. It looked like a very large modern round building. From what I can remember, it had what looked like picture windows all around it. There were lights above and below the windows. I could see there was light thru the windows. I wasn't able to stop, I was towing a large heavy trailer. At I circled the mountain, I saw it again, it still appeared to be descending. I told myself that it seemed to be moving because I was moving. A few weeks later I spoke with a friend who lives in Blue Ridge. I asked her about what I saw and if there was any type of building in that area that matched my description. She said no.
